adjective.description: Of, relating to, or characteristic of the composer Carl Maria von Weber (1786–1826) or his music.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in The Standard. From the name of Carl Maria von Weber, German Romantic composer + -ian<br>mid 19th century (in an earlier sense). From the name of Ernst Heinrich Weber + -ian<br>1920s; earliest use found in The Times Literary Supplement. From the name of Maximilian Carl Emil Weber, German sociologist and political economist + -ian.
